000: The start of the stairs, and at the right in the middle the cabin of the elevator.
010: The city of Eindhoven by Night
003: The button for the elevator. It does not work anymore. The elevator on goes until halfway. The remainder are stairs, and that is a problem if you need an elevator.
006: The bridge is in the air! The fence in front in the picture makes huge noise. The bars are vibrating heavily.
007: View by daylight. Mind that there is a piece of fence missing (at the left)
